points.text: application fully functional on Internet Explorer

API documentation is located in git (http://ant2.fit.vutbr.cz:9000/api.html)

menu buttons for management and applications -> switching changes URL and middle content
basic routes for Graphs and Watchdog views
menu buttons behaviour for all screens
